mapper.select: SELECT eng, part, `level` FROM ( SELECT eng, part, `level`, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY words.level ORDER BY RAND()) AS a FROM ref_word AS words) AS randwords WHERE randwords.a <= 5
SELECT eng, part, `level`, `description` FROM ( SELECT eng, part, `level`, `description`, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY RAND()) AS a FROM ref_word AS words) AS randwords WHERE randwords.a <= 10
